title: From Grand Tour Masters to Season of Disasters: Sepp Kuss Exit Latest Sting as Visma-Lease a Bike Races for Redemption at Tour de France
content:
Commentary: Nine months after team's own success pushed away Rogliƒç, it's a cruel irony it needs its founding centepiece more than ever.
